segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am looking for a pair of trousers . Do you have any good ideas ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about jeans ? It's the fashion now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't like it . Actually I am looking slacks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It seems all right . Do you have pantaloons ?
segments.speaker: S2
